title: Pepperoni Pizza
desc: A pepperoni pizza is a popular dish featuring a round crust topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and slices of spicy pepperoni sausage, often baked until crispy.

title: Chicken Hamburgare
desc: Grilled chicken breast topped with fresh lettuce, ripe tomato, and creamy mayonnaise, served on a toasted bun. Comes with a side of crispy fries or a garden salad.

title: Chicken Kebab
desc: Tender marinated chicken skewers grilled to perfection, served with a side of fragrant rice, fresh salad, and your choice of tangy garlic sauce or spicy chutney.

title: Döner Chicken
desc: Succulent slices of marinated chicken, slow-cooked on a vertical rotisserie, served in warm pita bread with crisp lettuce, juicy tomatoes, and drizzled with garlic sauce and spicy chili sauce. Accompanied by fries or a side salad.

title: Falafel Wrap
desc: Crispy, golden falafel balls wrapped in a warm pita with fresh cucumbers, tomatoes, and lettuce. Finished with a drizzle of tahini sauce and served with a side of tangy pickles.

title: Ice Cream Sundae
desc: Delicious scoops of your choice of ice cream served in a tall glass, topped with rich chocolate or caramel sauce, whipped cream, and a cherry on top. Choose from sprinkles or nuts for added crunch!

title: Ice Cream Cone
desc: A classic treat featuring a generous scoop of your favorite ice cream served in a crispy cone. Choose from a variety of flavors, topped with sprinkles or a cherry for extra delight!

title: Kebbab Wrap
desc: Grilled kebab meat wrapped in soft pita bread, filled with fresh vegetables, and drizzled with tangy garlic sauce and spicy harissa. Served with a side of crispy fries or a salad.

title: Meat Döner
desc: Sliced marinated beef or lamb, slow-cooked on a vertical rotisserie, served in warm pita or flatbread. Topped with fresh lettuce, tomatoes, onions, and drizzled with yogurt sauce and spicy chili sauce.

title: Orange Juice
desc: Refreshing and zesty juice made from freshly squeezed oranges, served chilled. Enjoy the natural sweetness and vibrant flavor in every sip, perfect for any meal or as a revitalizing drink!
